green_box_error_spam: one or more links triggered the spam filter
green_box_error_no_expert: Expert Green Boxes need an expert
green_box_error_no_answer: Expert Q&A Green Boxes need an answer
green_box_error_too_long: Short Quotes need to be 140 characters or fewer
green_box_notice_ref: <nowiki>Note: new <ref> tags require a page reload to appear in the Sources and Citations section below</nowiki>
green_box_notice_math: <nowiki>Note: new <math> tags may require a page reload to appear</nowiki>
green_box_article_edit_expert: Expertgreenbox templates can only be modified by certain users. If you spot something that needs changing, please contact the [[wikiHow_talk:Help|Help Team]].
green_box_quick_edit_expert: Note: Only certain users can change "expertgreenbox" templates. If your edits affect that template, they won't be saved.
